import React from "react"; import "./Post.css"; import { UilEllipsisV } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; function Post(props) { return (
Aman Srivastava {props.post.date}
{props.post?.desc}
{props.post.like} people liked it
{" "} {props.post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
